mean_cn: n. 安全，防护措施，债券，抵押
mean_en: the state of being protected or safe from harm
word_etyma: secur安全的 + ity名词后缀  → security 安全，证券
short_phrase: the security software of the  computer
deformation_desc: 监控加上持枪保镖，多严密的安全措施！
sentence: You must go through the security check at the airport.
sentence_trans: 进入机场，你必须进行安全检查。
